td.content: s:a 47 year old male test developer reports Neurological from time to time. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 69.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.

s:pt presents with Neurological for more than 2 weeks. pt is a white male aged 47 yrs. he drinks alcohol occasionally denies any smoking o:Height 180 cm, Weight 70.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgG Serum.

s:pt reports Neurological from time to time. pt is a male test developer aged 48 ys. Denies ever using tobacco he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 181 cm, Weight 71.9 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, B burgdorferi IgM CSF positive a:Paralysis p:administered Immune globulin - 400 mg/kg IV daily x 5 days, performed B burgdorferi IgM CSF, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
